scripts.build:
rm -rf package/* && HASH=$(openssl rand -hex 3) && tsc && zip -qr package/package-$HASH.zip dist/ node_modules/ package.json && echo "
Built package/package-$HASH.zip successfully"
scripts.invoke: aws lambda invoke --function-name ${0} --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out --payload file://fixtures/order.json fixtures/lambda/response.json
